parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game version

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Camera Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Smoothly conduct the changes that were assigned to a camera within the given time. If the time is set to zero, the changes are done immediately. This command is for use with <tt>camPrepareXXX</tt> commands. For the normal cam command use [[camCommit]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera [[camCommitPrepared]] time </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] - object of type "camera" </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> time: [[Number]] - time in seconds during which the changes shall be done </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>//create a camera object
_cam <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> "camera" [[camCreate]] [5600,4800,10];
_cam [[camPrepareTarget]] [[player]];
_cam [[cameraEffect]] ["internal", "BACK"];
_cam [[camCommitPrepared]] 0;
//smoothly move the camera to its new position in 6 seconds.
_cam [[camPreparePos]] [5680,4720,20];
_cam [[camCommitPrepared]] 6;
[[waitUntil]] {[[camCommitted]] _cam};
//proceed</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[camCommitted]], [[camCommit]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

</comment></dl>
